Connect with top-rated software developers skilled in various technologies, ready to bring your ideas to life. Filter by experience, project size, reviews, and budget to find the ideal software development firm for your business needs.<br>

<b>How is this Table Populated?</b>


<p>The table above uses our unbiased Leaders Matrix data within the software development service line. The Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the best-performing software development companies, each company featured is evaluated on specific criteria. This criteria includes Area of Focus and Ability to Deliver. Area of Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service. Ability to Deliver includes client reviews, past projects, market presence and reputation in the industry. These are not paid placements.</p>

<p>Note: This table was last updated on January 28, 2025.</p>

<b><p>Clutch Offers Objective, Independent Research &amp; Verified Client Experiences</p></b>

<p>Clutch empowers better business decisions as the leading marketplace of B2B service providers. Our in-depth and verified client experiences detail each project from start to finish, helping businesses looking to procure services, narrow down their list of potential business partners quickly and confidently.</p>

<p>With access to information such as how much a service provider charges for their services, how they communicate, and the results of the project, you can feel confident that you’ve found the right software development company for your project.</p>

<p>The verification process seeks to establish proof of connection between the reviewer and their own organization, as well as the collaboration they’re reviewing. By verifying the identity of the reviewer and confirming their connection to the project, Clutch is able to confirm that there is no conflict of interest and that the project took place. Buyers can easily identify verified reviews by the check mark in the bottom right corner of the review card. You can learn more about the <a href="https://help.clutch.co/en/knowledge/how-clutch-verifies-reviews"> review verification process here</a>.</p>

<b><p>Bespoke Software Development Expertise</p></b>

<p>Software development companies on Clutch are highly skilled and vetted. They are certified bespoke software developers with familiarity in multiple programming languages, frameworks, and application platforms. Whether you’re looking for a no-code, low-code, or fully custom platform, Clutch software development companies deliver high-quality results.</p>

<p>In addition to review rating, you can view awards, portfolio of past work and clients and industry recognitions. Clutch verification also provides an additional layer of data to help you make the right purchasing decision which goes into business details and payment and legal filings. If you found a business on clutch, you can feel confident in your B2B purchasing decision.</p>

<b><p>How Much does a Software Development Company Cost?</p></b>

Most custom software development projects on Clutch cost between $10,000–$49,999, but the total price depends on a variety of factors, including how complex the software is. In terms of hourly rate, you can expect to pay between $25-$49 per hour, but as the scope of your project expands, the more resources, time, and experience is required to bring your vision to life. As a result, the overall cost of your project will increase as well.<br>
<br>
<b><p>6 Questions to Ask Software Development Companies Before Hiring</p></b>

<p>Ask these questions when interviewing software agencies:</p>

<b><p>What is your experience with projects similar to ours?</p></b>

<p>By asking about their previous work, you can gauge whether they can deliver a product that meets your needs.To get a better understanding of what it could be like to work with a software development firm you’re talking with, ask them what their development process is like and the results were of similar projects </p>

<p>Better yet, ask them about hurdles they’ve experienced over the course of the project and how they overcame them.</p>

<b><p>Can you provide references or case studies from previous clients?</p></b>

<p>References provide valuable insights into the company’s past performance, reliability, and quality of work. Speaking directly with previous clients can help you understand how the company handles project challenges, communicates with clients, and meets deadlines. This first-hand feedback is often more candid and detailed than any marketing materials or case studies.</p>

<p>Moreover, references can shed light on the company's ability to deliver on its promises and maintain long-term relationships. By asking specific questions about the scope, budget adherence, and overall satisfaction, you can gain a clearer picture of what to expect. </p>

<b><p>What is your development process and how do you handle project management?</p></b>

<p>Project management is a key aspect of a successful software development partnership. Great software development companies have workflows and methodologies in place to make sure that the development process keeps moving forward. </p>

<p>Effective project management helps to set clear objectives, delineate responsibilities, and establish timelines, which are essential for keeping a project on track. By utilizing structured methodologies and tools, project managers can streamline processes, identify potential risks early, and allocate resources more effectively. </p>

<b><p>How do you ensure the quality of the software you develop?</p></b>

<p>Software development companies need to ensure that the product not only meets the project requirements but is also reliable, efficient, and user-friendly. To do this, they should allocate part of the project budget to testing and quality assurance. Understanding how they intend to do this ensures that the developer has a structured approach to managing and mitigating risks. </p>

<p>It also highlights their ability to provide consistent documentation, timely updates, and comprehensive support. A developer’s answer to this question can reveal their level of experience, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills, which are critical for delivering a successful product.</p>

<b><p>What is your approach to post-launch support and maintenance?</p></b>

<p>Post-launch support and regular maintenance are vital for the sustainability and continued success of any software solution. By asking companies about their support and maintenance strategies, you can ensure that you partner with a firm that prioritizes not just the development, but the longevity and reliability. </p>

<b><p>How do you manage communication and collaboration during the project?</p></b>

<p>Effective communication fosters transparency and trust between the client and the outsourcing provider, making it a cornerstone of a productive partnership. When outsourcing to a bespoke software development company, you should have established communication channels and regular touch points. This ensures smooth communication between your team and theirs, and also provides opportunities for collaboration and feedback, ensuring that the project runs smoothly. </p>

<b><p>Browse popular software programming languages:</p></b>  <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/sql">SQL developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/cplusplus">C++ developers</a> and <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/flutter">Flutter developers</a>. Also, be sure to examine software developers in different locations, such as <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/uk">UK software developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/us/developers">US software developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/ca/developers">Canada software developers</a>.

        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, Designli has received positive feedback regarding their knowledgeable team. Clients emphasized their ability to provide insightful suggestions and innovative ideas throughout the project. For instance, one client noted that Designli&#39;s experience significantly enhanced their initial app concept, leading to a more refined prototype. Another client praised the team&#39;s deep understanding of their business needs, stating they exceeded expectations by delivering a user-friendly design. This consistent sentiment underscores Designli&#39;s expertise and value in guiding clients through the development process.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding Brainhub&#39;s expertise is overwhelmingly positive, with clients highlighting their extensive technical knowledge and proactive approach. One client praised Brainhub&#39;s ability to provide multiple recommendations swiftly during a UX audit, while another emphasized their strong team dynamics and direct communication. Feedback consistently reflects satisfaction with Brainhub&#39;s understanding of business needs and their capability to align technology solutions accordingly. Clients noted that Brainhub’s developers demonstrated high skill levels, adaptability, and a commitment to adding business value.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="31689"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="169510"
          data-gtm_insight_id="719017"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">UX Design for Recruitment Marketing Agency</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 30, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              I appreciate Brainhub employees for their <b>business knowledge</b>. We spent a lot of time in discussions and workshops. They made sure that each functionality implemented had business value. You can see that Brainhub has a lot of experience and a lot of <b>business knowledge</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

        Reviews mention Exceptional performance
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have praised ROCKETECH for their exceptional performance in project management and technical expertise. One client highlighted their outstanding understanding of the app&#39;s needs and noted that ROCKETECH delivered significant value for the investment. Additionally, the team was commended for their effective communication and adherence to the agreed scope, ensuring a smooth development process. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with ROCKETECH&#39;s ability to meet and exceed client expectations.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        NextLink Labs has consistently been praised for their deep knowledge and expertise in DevSecOps and CI/CD practices. Clients noted their impressive understanding of source control management and their ability to seamlessly integrate solutions into existing workflows. For instance, one client highlighted their thoroughness in assessing infrastructure and providing tailored solutions, while another emphasized their proactive communication and effective project management. Overall, the sentiment is highly positive, with clients expressing satisfaction and noting no areas for improvement.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1713210"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="316615"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1993573"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">DevSecOps Strategy for Robotics Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 23, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The most impressive aspect was their <b>deep knowledge of source control management and DevSecOps</b>, coupled with their ability to seamlessly integrate these practices into our operations without any major disruptions.
            </p>
          </div>

                Customized support
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Customized support
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have praised AgileEngine for their customized support, highlighting their proactive communication and tailored service. One client noted the &#39;white-glove service delivery&#39; and direct access to decision-makers, which fostered a collaborative environment. Another mentioned the team&#39;s impressive coachability and ability to adapt to various industry needs, resulting in high-quality outputs. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with AgileEngine&#39;s personalized approach, although some clients suggested a desire for more U.S.-based resources to enhance communication.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="170095"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="86938"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1908204"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Staff Augmentation for Esports Betting Platform </h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 10, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The first person we got in touch with was our account manager, Olga (VP of Solutions, AgileEngine), and she remained with our project from start to finish. The <b>tailored communication and personal touch</b> made for a very pleasant collaboration. In the beginning, it took a week for us to align our values and expectations. However, <b>Olga was involved in the whole process to ensure that it ran smoothly</b>, and a great collaboration proceeded from there.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/agileengine/86938"

          data-gtm_provider_id="170095"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="142097"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1908204"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Analytics Suite for Boutique Advisory Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 17, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They do a great job of managing expectations and availability for web-based conferencing. They’ve tried to set things up in the morning, which is usually when clients want to meet, in order to set up the goals of the day. Communication is the number one factor. If something is not working for the client, or if they feel they’re not getting the level of service they anticipated or requested, they’re <b>one phone call away from the CEO</b>. Clients should feel free to voice their opinions and help address the challenge.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Vratislavia Software Sp. z o.o. for their extensive knowledge and expertise in developing tailored software solutions. One client highlighted their &#39;profound understanding of the legal industry&#39; and ability to customize a CRM system effectively. Another client noted the team&#39;s professionalism and organizational skills, stating they &#39;know what they do&#39; and communicate well. Overall, clients express high satisfaction with the company&#39;s knowledgeable approach, making them a reliable partner for complex projects.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Development for Law Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 18, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              What truly set Vratislavia Software apart was their <b>profound understanding of the legal industry</b>, combined with their agile approach to creating a customized CRM system. Their capacity to tailor every aspect of the CRM to our specific needs, rather than offering a one-size-fits-all solution, was remarkable. Their use of the latest technology ensured our system was not only effective but also future-proof.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceptional performance
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Widelab received exceptional feedback for their innovative and customer-centric approach. Clients praised their ability to merge design systems effectively, resulting in improved design efficiency and consistent branding. The team&#39;s professionalism in project management, timely deliveries, and open communication were highlighted as key strengths. Notably, the passion and enthusiasm of Widelab&#39;s team members significantly enhanced the collaboration experience, leaving clients thoroughly impressed with the overall service quality.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="703694"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="219797"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1963334"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Token-Based Design System Dev for Crypto ETP Issuer</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 25, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The <b>streamlined design components and reusable elements allowed designers to create interfaces faster</b>. This resulted in a cohesive user experience and brand identity. By utilizing the design tokens in our development process, our engineering team observed a reduction in development time. They were professional at keeping things on track and hitting all the project milestones. Timelines were always clear and we had weekly meeting in which updates were shared.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding TH-EY&#39;s knowledgeability is overwhelmingly positive. Clients highlighted their deep understanding of technical strategies, with one noting, &#34;Their knowledge of the topics&#34; and another praising their &#34;highly capable founders&#34; who are attentive to business needs. The team is recognized for their competency and proactive solutions, as one client stated, &#34;TH-EY are extremely knowledgeable and are ready to provide several solutions to any given problem.&#34; Overall, clients feel confident in TH-EY&#39;s expertise and responsiveness.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback consistently highlights Goji Labs&#39; extensive knowledge and expertise in their field. For instance, one client noted they were &#39;extremely knowledgeable and fun to work with,&#39; contributing significantly to the app&#39;s direction. Another client emphasized their &#39;forward-thinking&#39; approach, with modern ideas incorporated into project designs. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Goji Labs&#39; ability to proactively engage and provide valuable insights throughout the project lifecycle.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Vention for their engineers&#39; extensive knowledge and technical expertise. One client highlighted that the engineers not only excelled technically but also quickly grasped their business needs, aiding in the development of quality software. Another client noted their engineers&#39; impressive work ethic and ability to adapt, specifically in Salesforce and Node.js projects. Overall, the sentiment is overwhelmingly positive, with clients expressing high satisfaction and confidence in Vention&#39;s capabilities.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

        >

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 12, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They’re very <b>knowledgeable</b> and have an amazing work ethic. As we bring on new engineers, I’m committed to continuing using iTechArt due to the quality of work that our current engineers have demonstrated. They have a lot of <b>industry knowledge</b>, so we’re now training them on using our new tools because their work is very valuable to our organization.
            </p>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Reliable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently describe Relevant Software as a reliable partner, highlighting their exceptional project management and communication skills. One client noted, &#34;I knew I could always rely on them for guidance or assistance,&#34; indicating a strong sense of trust. Another emphasized the company&#39;s &#34;robust&#34; pre-sales process, which fostered transparency and established reliability. Overall, the sentiment reflects confidence in Relevant Software&#39;s ability to deliver high-quality solutions on time and maintain a collaborative working relationship.
      </p>
    </div>

With high customer satisfaction, over 90% of reviews highlight their expertise in bespoke software creation, timely delivery, and effective project management. <section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Reliable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The CGS team has received consistently positive feedback regarding their reliability. Clients emphasized their commitment to understanding project requirements and delivering results on time. For instance, one client noted their &#39;highly effective project management skills&#39; and another praised their &#39;reliability, friendliness, and quality of work.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects CGS as a trusted partner capable of aligning their solutions with client needs, further establishing their reputation for dependability.
      </p>
    </div>

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed ppc_item--element ppc_item-positioned "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="1445478"
    data-title="GCD"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Unique expertise
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a positive sentiment regarding GCD&#39;s unique expertise, highlighting their ability to understand complex, niche requirements swiftly. One client noted that GCD not only grasped their needs but also provided valuable suggestions for improvement. Their customer-centric approach and ease of collaboration were emphasized, with feedback stating they are &#39;true experts in their field.&#39; Overall, clients appreciate GCD&#39;s commitment to delivering tailored solutions that enhance operational efficiencies.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom CRM Development for Warranty Insurance Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 22, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              GCD have a customer centric approach. Our requirements were niche and complex, yet they quickly grasped what we needed and even offered suggestions to improve on what we originally wanted. They're <b>incredibly easy to do business with and are true experts in their field</b>.
            </p>

    </ul>

  </div>

  
  <div id="insight-2194649-feedback" class="feedback feedback--locations">
  <p class="feedback__message">Was this helpful?</p>

        </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, LeanCode has received positive feedback regarding their timeliness in project delivery. Clients consistently noted that LeanCode delivered all items on time, with one client stating, &#34;All deliverables in the roadmap so far are delivered on time.&#34; Another client highlighted their effective communication and adherence to deadlines, remarking, &#34;They keep their deadlines and their word.&#34; The sentiment surrounding timeliness is overwhelmingly positive, with no significant concerns raised in this area.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="208407"
              data-gtm_insight_id="827048"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Timely
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Intobi has consistently received positive feedback regarding their timely delivery of projects. Clients noted their ability to meet deadlines without compromising quality, with one CEO stating, &#39;Intobi delivered the application on time.&#39; Another client highlighted their &#39;highly efficient and reliable&#39; project management, emphasizing that items were consistently delivered as scheduled. Overall, the sentiment regarding timeliness is overwhelmingly favorable, with clients appreciating Intobi&#39;s responsiveness and commitment to maintaining timelines.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="208407"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="318549"
          data-gtm_insight_id="827048"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Staff Aug, Software & Backend Dev for UX/UI Design Co</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 30, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Intobi's project management was highly efficient and reliable. They <b>consistently delivered items on time</b>, ensuring that deadlines were met without compromising quality. The team was very responsive to our needs, actively listening to our requirements and quickly adapting to any changes or challenges that arose during the project.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/intobi/318549"
            title="View Intobi Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="208407"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="318549"
            data-gtm_insight_id="827048"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

            >Trigma is a comprehensive software development firm specializing in custom software creation and end-to-end software development. The company consistently receives positive feedback, with approximately 90% of reviews highlighting their adaptability, timely delivery, and tailored solutions. Clients frequently commend Trigma for their extensive industry knowledge, particularly in fields like real estate, finance, and tech, with many appreciating their expertise and customer-centric approach.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The reviews for Trigma consistently highlight their impressive knowledge and expertise. Clients noted their ability to understand complex requirements quickly, exemplified by one client who remarked on Trigma&#39;s &#39;vast knowledge&#39; and another who praised their &#39;attention to detail.&#39; Additionally, the CEO of a navigational service company emphasized Trigma&#39;s CEO as &#39;brilliant&#39; and commended the team&#39;s planning and execution. Overall, the sentiment regarding Trigma&#39;s knowledge is overwhelmingly positive, with no significant areas for improvement noted.
      </p>
    </div>

Overall, the sentiment surrounding their expertise is highly positive, with feedback indicating that they are adept at delivering tailored solutions based on clear communication of expectations.

One CEO noted their ability to provide solutions that were &#39;1–2 steps ahead,&#39; demonstrating a proactive approach to problem-solving. Another client emphasized the team&#39;s understanding of business value, which significantly contributed to client satisfaction. Overall, the sentiment regarding their knowledge is overwhelmingly positive, with clients expressing confidence in their capabilities and recommending their services.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently express high satisfaction with Memory Squared&#39;s expertise and knowledge. One CEO noted their &#39;great potential&#39; in custom e-commerce processes, highlighting the team&#39;s ability to provide insightful workshops that refined project ideas. A freelance service designer praised their &#39;theoretical knowledge&#39; and innovative suggestions regarding AI integration, emphasizing the team&#39;s commitment to sharing their expertise. Overall, feedback reflects a strong sentiment of appreciation for Memory Squared&#39;s knowledgeable and professional approach.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="1152835"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">UI/UX Design for Digital Marketing Agency</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 28, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              When we first reached Memory Squared, their answer was quick and professional. We’ve decided to hold a meeting with them to explain what we want to achieve. <b>They were not afraid to ask questions but also were happy to share their experience in the e-commerce and mobile apps</b>, so we could understand the complexity of such a project. The workshops they provided shed new light on our ideas and impressed our client.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The reviews for Kultprosvet consistently highlight their extensive knowledge and expertise. Clients commend the team for their proactive approach and ability to identify potential issues, as noted by a PhD researcher who stated they were &#39;highly knowledgeable&#39; and provided clear explanations. A startup CEO emphasized their reliability and deep understanding of technology, remarking on their &#39;smart, honest, knowledgeable, and reliable&#39; nature. Overall, the sentiment surrounding Kultprosvet&#39;s knowledge is overwhelmingly positive, showcasing their capability to guide clients effectively.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="44611"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="245249"
          data-gtm_insight_id="731350"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Outsourcing Development Services for AI SaaS Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 30, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Listen carefully to the individuals you work with because they are highly experienced. They won’t offer you anything you don’t need; trust that they are doing their best to guide you in the right direction. If you listen to their advice, you’ll be successful because they have so much <b>experience and knowledge</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/kultprosvet/245249"
            title="View Kultprosvet Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="44611"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="245249"
            data-gtm_insight_id="731350"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="44611"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="213281"
          data-gtm_insight_id="731350"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">

One review notably mentioned that the team delivered items on time while being helpful and accommodating throughout the project. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Solar Digital&#39;s flexibility and commitment to meeting client needs effectively.

                Easy to reach
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Easy to reach
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients generally express positive sentiments regarding Instil Software&#39;s accessibility and communication. One client noted, &#39;communication was never a problem,&#39; highlighting their commitment to daily meetings. However, there were occasional concerns about periods of silence during information collection, with a client suggesting that timely updates would enhance the experience. Overall, the feedback indicates that Instil Software is easy to reach and responsive, contributing to a productive partnership.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="151939"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="137022"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1859159"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Development for Consumer Electronics Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 28, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Instil Software was very good at meeting deadlines. We had daily meetings with them — <b>communication was never a problem</b>. I wasn’t necessarily involved in the day-to-day development of the software.
            </p>
          </div>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Custom Software Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        UI/UX Design &amp; Software Dev for Electronics Manufacturer
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">4.5</span>
        —  Instil supports an electronics manufacturer in the design of a new UI for their next-generation platform. The team also works on UX design and implementation using JavaScript, TypeScript, and
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/instil/308609"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, client feedback highlights Railsware&#39;s extensive knowledge and expertise in software development. One CTO noted their developers&#39; ability to quickly onboard to existing code and effectively communicate technical decisions. Another client emphasized Railsware&#39;s professionalism and their comprehensive understanding of user testing and product management processes. Additionally, a co-founder praised the team&#39;s ability to integrate seamlessly into their operations, showcasing a depth of knowledge that significantly contributed to project success. The sentiment surrounding Railsware&#39;s knowledge is overwhelmingly positive.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="1672662"
        >

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 26, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We worked with very experienced developers before and <b>their expertise in application development exceeded my expectations</b>. They were able to onboard to the codebase and gain the business knowledge very quickly in order to step in and take over the project. They also give very clear reasoning behind the technical decisions they make.
            </p>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback consistently highlights the extensive knowledge and expertise of Ballard Chalmers. One client noted their ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly, while another emphasized their adaptability to project requirements. The team is praised for their thorough understanding of Microsoft technologies, with specific mention of their proficiency in the Microsoft stack. Overall, clients express a high level of confidence in their capabilities, indicating that their knowledgeable approach significantly contributes to successful project outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>

<meta itemprop="position" content="26">

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="23275"
    data-title="TechMagic"

    
        data-position="126"
        data-type="Directory"

                    class="provider__description-text-more  project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >TechMagic is a bespoke software development company specializing in custom software creation, with a focus on tailored and end-to-end software development services. The overall feedback from clients is overwhelmingly positive, with reviewers praising their ability to meet deadlines, maintain clear communication, and integrate seamlessly with client teams. Approximately 90% of reviewers highlight their effective project management and strong cultural fit, while only a small fraction mention areas for potential improvement, emphasizing their competence in software engineering and managed software development.

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback regarding TechMagic&#39;s timeliness is overwhelmingly positive. Several reviews highlight that all key milestones and deliverables were consistently met on time. For instance, one client noted that despite project complexity, TechMagic effectively managed deadlines without compromising quality. Another client praised their fast and effective management, stating that the project was delivered under strict deadlines. Overall, clients express high satisfaction with TechMagic&#39;s ability to deliver projects promptly and responsively.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Lionwood.software for their extensive knowledge and expertise. One client noted that their developers quickly assimilated into the team and even taught UK members effective remote work methodologies. Feedback highlighted their capability to provide valuable insights and technical improvements, demonstrating a high level of thoroughness and quality in their work. Overall, the sentiment is highly positive, emphasizing Lionwood.software&#39;s ability to integrate seamlessly and enhance team performance.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">

        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1878376"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1963413"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceptional performance
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceptional performance
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Codepoint for their exceptional performance, highlighting their timely delivery and high-quality outcomes. One client noted that all project elements were completed without issues and ahead of schedule, while another emphasized the impressive skills and dedication of the team. The overall sentiment reflects satisfaction with Codepoint&#39;s professionalism, responsiveness, and commitment to excellence, with clients expressing confidence in their ability to exceed expectations.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1878376"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="251518"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1963413"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web App Dev & API Management for Translation Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 23, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Very quick responses, on-time deliveries and deliveries ahead of schedule, <b>in-depth testing, feedback and suggestions provided throughout the whole process to simplify the project and achieve the same or better results</b>. Their business ethic and politeness were impressive. They were very professional and approachable at the same time, always there to listen to our needs/concerns.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/codepoint-0/251518"
            title="View Codepoint Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="1878376"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="251518"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1963413"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1878376"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="214341"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1963413"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev for Sports Software Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1286631"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1409432"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Customized support
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Customized support
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express high satisfaction with Asabix&#39;s customized support, highlighting their responsiveness and expertise. One client noted the team&#39;s commitment to excellence and their ability to integrate complex functionalities tailored to specific needs. The seamless communication and outstanding quality of work were particularly praised, with clients feeling that Asabix consistently exceeded expectations. Overall, the sentiment regarding customized support is overwhelmingly positive, with clients eager to continue their collaboration with the firm.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1286631"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="233875"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1409432"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">E-Commerce Design & Dev for Entertainment Services Co</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 19, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We are very happy with the results! From the very beginning, Bogdan and his team exhibited commitment to excellence and their performance exceeded our expectations on every front. <b>Communication was seamless throughout the entire project. They were quick to respond to my inquiries</b>, which helped us maintain a dynamic and efficient workflow. Bogdan, Yurii, and others demonstrated an impressive level of expertise in web development. They flawlessly executed complex functionalities and <b>integrated custom features to meet our specific needs</b>. The website they created functions seamlessly and aligns with our brand identity.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Easy to work with
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Brightscout is consistently described as &#39;wonderful to work with&#39; and &#39;phenomenal,&#39; showcasing their collaborative nature and receptiveness to client feedback. Clients appreciated their ability to manage projects effectively, delivering results on time and within budget. The VP of operations at Phylum highlighted the ease of collaboration and strategic involvement of senior resources, which contributed significantly to their branding success. Overall, client sentiment strongly indicates that Brightscout is an easy and effective partner for projects.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_review_id="171084"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1315772"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Rebranding & Development Services for Cybersecurity Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 8, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Overall, <b>they were wonderful to work with</b>; I honestly would recommend them to anyone. Meanwhile, Brightscout was collaborative and aware of what would make a successful, stand-out design in the market. At the same time, <b>they were receptive to feedback</b> from our founders and the executives in terms of what they wanted to communicate.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--service-line">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">

    <ul class="features">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Custom Software Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        MVP Software Dev &amp; Design for Secured Payments Platform
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Brightscout designed and developed a secured payments platform's MVP software. The team worked on the software's requirements, high-fidelity UI designs in Figma, CI/CD automation, QA, and testing.
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/brightscout/336644"
          title="Read Full Review on Brightscout"
          aria-label="Read Full Review on Brightscout"

Overall, clients express high satisfaction and confidence in their capabilities.

        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praised Serokell&#39;s knowledgeable approach, highlighting their deep expertise in machine learning and blockchain development. For instance, a CEO noted their proactive project management and impressive understanding of advanced ML techniques, resulting in a 10-15% error correction improvement. Similarly, another client emphasized Serokell&#39;s profound blockchain expertise and their ability to suggest valuable enhancements during development. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with Serokell&#39;s technical knowledge and innovative solutions.
      </p>
    </div>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Custom Software Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        ML Model Dev &amp; Digital Strategy for AI-Based Film Tool
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  SEROKELL is developing a machine learning (ML) model for an AI-based film tool. SEROKELL supports the development of image-generation models and offers consulting on the client's go-to-market
        
        <a

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="46156"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1754816"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceptional results
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceptional results
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express exceptional satisfaction with STRV, highlighting their expertise and dedication. One client noted, &#34;STRV really took on our project as their own,&#34; emphasizing the team&#39;s meticulous approach to design and development. Feedback underscores the seamless collaboration and clear communication, with clients feeling their input was valued throughout the process. The overall sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for STRV&#39;s commitment to quality, with one client stating, &#34;from day one, you really feel that your product is in safe hands.&#34;
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="46156"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="38986"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1754816"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">App Development for Dating Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 13, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              STRV really took on our project as their own, approaching even the smallest tasks with great care. They wanted to understand our motivations, our goals, our worries...everything. In terms of <b>design and development quality, they’re absolute experts in what they do</b>. The product manager is always thinking many steps ahead and evaluating each detail from all angles.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/strv/38986"
            title="View STRV Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="46156"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="38986"

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1691157"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1504284"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Establish clear expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Establish clear expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a positive sentiment regarding Five Jars&#39; ability to establish clear expectations throughout their projects. One client highlighted that Five Jars effectively communicates project scope, ensuring transparency about what is included or excluded from the engagement. Additionally, they noted that despite occasional delays, the clear communication maintained a mutual understanding of timelines and project direction. The emphasis on intentional processes and open dialogue was also recommended for successful collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1691157"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="178432"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1504284"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Dev, Design, Hosting & Maintenance for Nonprofit Org</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 30, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We have very good communication with Five Jars, so we’ve been able to stay connected on the project; their team has spent a lot of time listening to our needs. Additionally, they’re great from a budgetary perspective, and they <b>set clear expectations</b>. For example, they tell us if something is within or outside the scope before we start any project. From a time management perspective, we’ve had delays on both ends. Still, our communication is so clear that whenever we’ve strayed from the projected timeline, we’ve always understood why, and we always have a clear path forward.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/five-jars/178432"
            title="View Five Jars Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="1691157"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="178432"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1504284"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

      target="_blank"

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Custom Software Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Web App Development for Construction Company
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  TechnoYuga Soft Pvt. Ltd. developed a web app for a construction company. The app featured a platform to import and process building information models and tools for real-time visualization and

          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/technoyuga-soft/336665"

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Flexible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MentorMate has received positive feedback regarding their flexibility in project management and development. Clients noted their eagerness to find solutions and adapt to challenges, with one client highlighting their ability to manage complex data requirements efficiently. Another client praised their responsiveness to project changes and the capacity to adjust team size as needed. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for MentorMate&#39;s flexibility, contributing to successful collaborations across various projects.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1669712"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1500960"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Knowledgeable
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Old.St Labs for their extensive knowledge and constructive approach. One client noted their ability to interpret complex concepts effectively, resulting in a product that exceeded expectations. Feedback highlighted their focus on deliverables without overwhelming technical jargon, showcasing their depth of knowledge. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their expertise and the value they brought to the project.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1669712"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="98386"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1500960"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Prototype Design for Community-Building Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 16, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They were <b>knowledgeable and very constructive</b> in the process. They brought a depth of knowledge to the process, and they were able to solve the problems effectively. They took a relatively poorly specified concept, and brought it all together to present something beyond our expectations.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="30049"
              data-gtm_insight_id="717196"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Knowledgeable
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Exoft for their extensive knowledge and expertise in software development. One client highlighted that Exoft&#39;s developers are &#39;extremely talented and knowledgeable,&#39; capable of providing valuable insights on UI/UX and functional requirements. Another client noted their team&#39;s &#39;strong critical-thinking skills,&#39; which were instrumental in refining project architecture. Overall, client sentiment reflects high confidence in Exoft&#39;s capabilities, emphasizing their proactive approach and technical proficiency.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="30049"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="148978"
          data-gtm_insight_id="717196"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Development for IT Consulting Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 6, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Exoft’s developers are extremely talented and <b>knowledgeable in the areas they specialize</b>, and they take direction very well. The amount of <b>knowledge and expertise that Exoft’s developers have is impressive</b>. They know the platforms very well, and they always engage with us to help refine features to make them the best they can be, going a level deeper than just developing what we request.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 15, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They have very strong critical-thinking skills, which have proven to be very helpful in flagging potential issues down the road. Be sure to meet the individual developers you’ll be working with to gauge their passion and <b>knowledge in the technologies</b> they’ll be assisting you with. Prepare a handful of questions to gauge their critical thinking abilities, which is potentially more important than their experience as developers.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Ingsoftware for their hard work and dedication to projects. One client noted their project manager&#39;s exceptional organization and timely execution, stating, &#39;They go above and beyond being a vendor.&#39; Another highlighted their commitment to resolving issues, emphasizing that Ingsoftware &#39;owns it and works hard to fix it.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their diligent efforts and collaborative spirit.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="37774"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="45040"
          data-gtm_insight_id="725513"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Development for Leather & Jewelry Store</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 4, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Our ING project manager is truly like an in-house team member for us and that is why we keep going back to ING. They go above and beyond being a 'vendor'. <b>They really cared about our projects and worked hard to help us run an effective business</b>. No one is perfect and we have had issues from time to time. But what I find impressive is that they don't run away from, or try to deflect, the issues. <b>They own it and work hard to fix it</b>. They wanted to maintain good relationships with clients and kept them. Not every firm is like this.
            </p>
          </div>
